featured_works.title: अष्टाध्यायी (Ashtadhyayi)
featured_works.reasoning: Foundational work in linguistics by Panini (4th c. BCE). Contains 3,959 sutras establishing Sanskrit grammar through algebraic-style rules. Historical significance equivalent to Euclid's Elements
